verbs.description: For the first time , this trial balloon : a vow of silence from [ARG0: President Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-ADV: really] [V: wants] [ARG1: to testify] .
For the first time , this trial balloon : a vow of silence from President Trump , [R-ARG0: who] really wants to [V: testify] .
